page.title: 15AN INTERVIEW WITH MR BASSETT
page.content: On Thursday 13th June we interviewed Mr Bassett. Mr Bassett had lived in Frant for 72 years before he moved to Wadhurst he has now moved to Wadhurst for 5 years. The Bassett family had a shop on the corner of the High Street for 12O years. It changed to a restaurant in 198O. In the time of the shop people used to order from the shop and it was taken to the peoples homes so not many people came into the shop each week. The shop sold everything from oil lamps to loaves of bread. The furthest place that Mr Bassett used to deliver was Eridge.
